description: Yakovlev is an Amestrian State Military Officer from the Internal Affairs office at Central Command in Central City. Along with Storch, he approaches http://anidb.net/ch6587 [Riza Hawkeye] with transfer orders from the top, reassigning her to the post of http://anidb.net/ch10175 [FÃ¼hrer]`s personal secretary. Like all military offices in the series, Yakovlev is named for a type of real world military vehicle, in this case the Russian military planes built by the Yakovlev aircraft company.
name: Yakovlev
